name: Quest on the Dreaming Castle
description:
Game where the player has to go through the castle and jump to different platforms as well as over barrels to get to the magic crystals.

my mood-board for this game was dreaming. 

For my example of my game I have the screenshots of my first level and a video play through. 

Credits:

I created the levels 

the art assets I used from unity were:

Stones and buried treasure 

free trees

training table

LowPolyFantasyClouds

DayInTheClouds

MedievalCastlePack

music: Medieval Introduction by Tristan Lohengrin

textures: grass01_BigUV, Brick01_mat, training table, stylize wood
